notes: Dataset collected from natural dialogs which enables to test the ability of dialog systems to interactively learn new facts from user utterances throughout the dialog. The dataset, consisting of 1900 dialogs, allows simulation of an interactive gaining of denotations and questions explanations from users which can be used for the interactive learning.
title: Question Dialogs Dataset
